text: Grand Rohan Jogja merupakan hotel yang ramah muslim, menghadirkan fasilitas yang memudahkan ibadah untuk seluruh tamu. Hal ini saya rasakan pada saat masuk ke kamar, sudah tersedia alat ibadah untuk muslim. Selanjutnya ketika di area hotel, terdengar suara adzan indah dari mushola hotel. Keramahan tercipta juga ketika berada di restoran. Pelayan menggunakan pakaian muslim bebas dan ramah melayani tamu. Seragam yang ramah bersahabat dengan tamu menjadikan serasa makan dirumah sendiri. Hal ini juga terasa ketika melihat pegawai yang menggunakan hijab dengan rapih. Selain itu menu makanan beraneka ragam. Sehingga dapat menjadi rekomendasi menginap di Yogyakarta

text:
Salah satu Hotel dengan Nuansa Syariah yang elegan di Jogjakarta. Selain itu, Nuansa budaya Keraton Jawa juga bisa kita temui di sini. Kamar yang cukup luas, ruang terbuka hijau, Taman dengan kolam ikan, dll akan membuat kita betah menginap di hotel ini.

text:
Di akhir bulan September saya dan keluarga pulang ke Jogja untuk acara keluarga, dan di malam pertama kami memutuskan untuk menginap di Grand Rohan.
Kami tiba di hotel jam 9 malam, dan kesan pertama masuk ke kamar adalah bersih dan cukup besar. pada saat sarapan, variasi makanannya banyak.. dekat dengan kolam ikan, wahana bermain anak dan juga kolam renang..
sayang banget waktu itu anak saya masih pilek jadi belum bisa renang disana.
di hari sabtu saya tidak sengaja bertemu dengan sales leader - mba evi. beliau sangat ramah.. 

Terima kasih grand rohan, semoga kami bisa datang dan menginap lagi disana..

title: Weekend Jogja

text: Hotel sangat bersih dengan kamar yang luas, perlengkapan kamar mandi lengkap, ada kolam renang dan masjid, makanan semua enak dan berfariasi, petugas ramah ramah, dan perduli banget, baru kali ini saya menginap dan di telp ke kamar untuk memastikan perlengkapan di kamar berfungsi dengan baik, bagi saya perhatian seperti ini luarbiasa, protokol kesehatan selama pandemi covid diterapkan dengan baik, puas sekali dengan pengalaman saya menginap di hotel ini, mantab. title: Hotel syariah yg luarbiasa

text: Alhamdulillah Grand Rohan Jogja menjadi alternatif hotel syariah yang nyaman dan aman untuk keluarga. Hotel juga memberikan fasilitas masjid dan adzan 5 waktu yang membuat kami semakin betah. Semoga semua fasilitas terus ditingkatkan.
title: Hotel Syariah di Jogja

text: Pelayanan baik dan makanan enaak, saya sangat merekomendasika  hotel ini untuk kepetingan meeting kantor, kunjungan keluarga atau pribadi. Tempatnya representatif dekat kota, pusat kota. Jalur transportasi musah. Direstoran di bantu oleh mbak dedes sangat baik. Semoga ke sepan hotel semakon maju dan sebagai hotel syariah yang amanah dan nyaman

title: Liburan

text: Menu di resto sangat bervariasi. Bagus, pelayanan dengan mba Isma terhadap tamu ramah, kamar bersih. Semua room non smoking jadi nda perlu khawatir ada bau asap rokok. Tersedia ruang bermain anak dan kolam renang buat bermain keluarga. Recommended place.
title: Wisata Kota Jogja

text:
Hotel grand Dafam rohan adalah hotel syariah 4* di Jogja yang sdh menerapkan protokol kesehatan. Di setiap pubkic area tekah tersedia tempat cuci tangan dan hand sanitizer. 
Untuk restaurant menyediakan makanan yang halal...serta sudah di terapkan protokol kesehatan dengan cara setiap petugas menggunakan hand gloves + masker serta faceshield. Setiap pengunjung yg masuk ke resto selalu dicek suhu dan diberikan hand gloves serta wajib menggunakan masker untuk setiap pengunjung yang masuk hotel. 
Di setiap di kamar disediakan alat ibadah yang sudah bersih rapi. Sukses buat grand dafam rohan..hotel ini recommended buat pleasure, bisnis ataupun family 👍👍🤩🤩.
title: Explore Jogja

text: Pelayanan dengan isma yang sangat baik,sesuai dengan protokol kesehatan yang berlaku, pelayanan dari para staffnya juga sangat ramah dan bersahabat fasilitas yang disuguhkan juga sangat bagus lalu suasananya juga sangat nyaman.

text: Saya dan keluarga sengaja mencoba berbuka puasa di hotel Grand Dafam Rohan karna dengar dari teman2 saya. Ternyata benar, untuk menu buka puasa semua tamu akan dimanjakan dengan banyaknya menu yg sangat lengkap dan enak. Tempat yg luas serta ada gardennya. Gak akan nyesel pokoknya berbuka puasa disini. Semua karyawan ramah, mulai dr security sampe front office pun dengan ramah membantu para tamu menuju tempat berbuka. Yang bikin kami takjub ada masjid besar di hotel ini. Masjid dengan ornamen yang indah lengkap dg pralatan ibadah yg memadai. Sungguh ingin rasanya berlama lama berada disini. Spot foto pun banyak juga disini jadi tidak perlu khawatir jika ingin mengabadikan moment ketika berkunjung di Grand Dafam Rohan. Next tahun depan pasti balik lagi.

text:
Pertama kali masuk ke hotel ini, nuansa bangunan bersejarah sangat kental terasa. Disambut replika monumen tugu yang menghiasi depan lobby hotel, membuat rasa tinggal di Jogja semakin terasa. 

Memasuki area lobby hotel, resepsionis dengan ramah menyambut setiap tamu dengan salam. Setiap pengunjung terutama yang muslim pasti akan diingatkan bila hotel grand dafam hanya menerima pasangan yang sudah menikah. Tapi ini tak menutup kemungkinan pengunjung non muslim juga bisa menginap.

Hal yang menurut saya exotic di hotel ini adalah keberadaan taman di area dekat restauran yang sunggu mempesona mata. Jajaran tanaman yang diatur sedemikan rupa membuat taman ini seperti obat penyejuk mata. Indah dan menyegarkan. 

Last but not least. Menu makanan yang disajikan sangat bervariasi. Mulai dari bubur, sup, kudapan, jamu, nasi, lauk pauk, sayur, buah, gudeg, sereal dan macam banyaknya. Hanya saja perlu jadi catatan adalah kematangan beberapa sajian yang perlu diperhatikan. Kadang ayam dan spagethi kurang matang dalam memasaknya
title: Hotel bernuansa syariah dengan lingkungan yang memukau mata

text: Sesuai namanya memakai embel-embel syariah maka hotel ini memang melarang pasangan bukan muhrim menginap satu kamar. Di kamar disiapkan piranti sholat (sarung dan sajadah). Tersedia Al Quran dan setiap waktu azan diperdengarkan di setiap kamar. Kamar mandinyapun disediakan keran air yang bisa untuk berwudhu. Kamarnya cukup luas dan nyaman. Menu makan untuk breskfast sangat beragam, yang saya suka tersedia minuman jamu khas Jawa. Ada sinom, kunyit asem, beras kencur, sirih. Rasanya dibadan terasa segar. Catatan saya tentang hotel ini. Pada saat brekfast diperdengarkan musik, akan tetapi sayangnya lagunya lagu barat. Lebih baik jika lagu yang diperdengarkan lagu khas Jawa berupa gending misalnya. Tetapi saya sangat puas menginap di hotel ini dan saya rekomendasikan jika ke Yogyakarta dapat menginap di hotel ini.
title: HOTEL YANG ISLAMI

text:
This hotel is very brand new.. They start to run 3month ago.  So the hotel  is very clean and comfortable.. 

But in my opinion.. There's many things has to be finalised .. It looks like they push to open the hotel.. Before the finishing work was finish.. . There's some detail that has to be done.. Like the door on the toilet (picture below) and some other.. 

But in general.. It's ok.. And we spent 3 night there without any complaint. Their staff was friendly... 
They have comfortable room, big enough... But in my opinion there should be (minimum) a single sofa in the room.. (like other 4star hotel).. 

We stayed in connecting room.. And funniest thing was happening , when the housekeeping cannot found the key... And should try every key one by one... 

Their restaurant is very large and comfortable, but their menu is so so.  Not. Much variation and the taste is so so. 

They also have swimming pool.. Not big enough .. And still need some improvement.
title: New hotel.. Good location

text:
I was really impressed staying here, almost all the rooms / facilities that I noticed were very clean. The staff service is very friendly, and what amazed me the most was the sound of the call to prayer every prayer time from the hotel mosque. This is amazing, this is the first time I've come across something like this.

Sarongs, prayer mats and clean mukenas are also available in the room upon check-in. The garden at the back is also very large and child friendly.

What needs to be improved is only the taste of food for breakfast. The menu is very complete and has many choices, it's just that in terms of taste, I think it's still lacking.

But, overall I am satisfied staying at Grand Rohan Jogja.
title: The Most Sharia Hotel

text:
My husband and I were here for 10 days for our Staycation holiday just before Ramadan 2020. The services are all excellent. Even in the toughest time, they do their best to provide you comfort.

We had gotten some choices of food every day that we could select according to our taste. They changed it every few days to make sure that we were not tired of eating the same dishes over and over.

Their food taste were all authentic, and they had patient with us. I know, we were not easy guests for them. But still, they treated us with the utmost hospitality.

They have a collection of books in the lounge and they are all valuable to Muslims. You can hear the Adhaan in the hotel and then you can come down to the Ground Floor to offer a prayer in their Masjid.

I recommend this hotel for Muslims who travel to Yogyakarta and are wishing to have a nice 4 Stars hotel that does not serve alcohol and offers services according to Islamic values.

However, our room was close to a street and Indonesian streets can be very loud at times. Especially those irresponsible drivers with loud motorbike. This might disturb your sleep because the room we were in was not really sound-proof. This can be solved if you choose a room that is not facing the street.

They do not accept non-married couples to share a room. So, make sure to bring a certified statement that you are married so you can have a room with your spouse.

Thank you Grand Dafam Rohan. We will definitely make a comeback.
title: Recommended Place to Stay for Pious Muslims

text:
Two months ago, I booked a room in the Grand Dafam hotel in Jogyakarta because I wanted to go to the VW Festival in the expo center, 8th to 10th of november, just in front of the hotel. I already stayed there two time for the same show two and four years ago.
This time, I came with a Thai woman who shares my life since one year. We already travelled together to France, Germany, England, Italy the last few months without any problems and we live in Bali 6 months a year.
When I arrived, the man at the reception asked me our passports. When he saw my friend, he asked me a wedding certificate which I don’t have as I am still married in France but we are officialy separated with my ex-wife.
He said to me that the hotel’s rules dictated him to not allow us to stay in the same room because we were not married. I was very upset. I said to him that this is Muslim law, but me I am Christian and my friend is Bhuda so this law do not apply to us. I said that I will understand that he applied this rule to other muslim people but not to me.
But he refused to give me the room key.
But by booking a room on trip.com in this hotel, and prepaid the total of 3 nights, we had a business contract together. The hotel staff broke this contract for religious belief which is absolutly unacceptable in a 5 stars hotel. 
When I booked the room, nobody asked me who will be the second party, nobody informed me that we have to be legally married…
So please, forget this hotel. If we accept this, we will have to accept the same thing in all hotels that belong to muslim people all over the world, in all airlines that belonged to muslim people…and more....
title: My booking was cancelled by hotel for religious belief !

owner_response.text:
Dear our beloved guest jackymorel,

Assalamu'alaikum warahmatullah wabarakatuh

We do apologize for the case that happen to you, and we are please to share with you about our concept of hotel. For your information, Grand Dafam Rohan Jogja is syariah concept hotel, and we do realize that we will not acceptable for every market since not every person get understand about what syariah actually is. But we believe that people will accept by the time they understand how syariah is. 

As the ruled by government too, syariah is forbid the unmarried couple to stay at the any lodging include hotel. That's why we ask you the wedding certificate to proof you were married. And yes you will not find much hotel like us in Indonesia, while at that time we already helped you finding another hotel still near your venue of agenda.

I have to say that our hotel concept is based on religion concept, but we are open for every market to stay with us following the applied regulation of hotel, just like another hotel with their own different regulation. For the time your stay two years ago, there is no problem since it is single occupation, but when it is couple occupation, we have to ask the marriage status.

We will follow up by reviewing the Travel Agent that you've used to book our hotel, to make sure that hotel regulation is noted and showed there. This is the big evaluation for us since we always try to ensure that all travel agent platforms whether online of offline are understand and showing our regulation to their market. Thus, to make sure that the people who are really know the rules who came and stay with us, and feel the different experience of staying at hotel. 

Once again, we do apologize for your inconvenience. We hope next time we can meet again to give you our favorite menu of our Grandin Restaurant, as our apology for the case.

Syariah hospitality regards,

Asmoro Handriyanto
General Manager
Grand Dafam Rohan Jogja

text:
I stayed at Grand Dafam Yogyakarta August 29 - 31 and experienced terrible service. During the night of August 30 - 31 the hotel was constructing a stage for some commercial event in the hotel's back yard. I first contacted the reception at midnight as it was not possible to sleep due to the construction noise of power tools, drills, etc. The reception said they would talk to the construction crew. However, nothing changed and at 2 am in addition to drilling, they started banging metal constructions with hammer. I called the reception again and their response was "they will finish soon". At 2am in the morning!!!! Needless to say I felt horrible when I got up at five to depart for the airport, having slept just couple of hours.
That is last time I stayed in Grand Dafam.
title: Construction work during the night: no sleep

I suggest you to stay here 👌🏻

text:
We stayed two nights in this place ... nice hotel, clean, friendly service, comfortable atmosphere ... various breakfast menu choices and tasted very good .. spacious swimming pool, very nice garden, very instagramable.. theres mini vehicle museum displaying vintage vehicles ..

the rooms are big and spacious ... we booked in a non-balcony deluxe room then the hotel upgraded our room to a deluxe with a balcony ... the amenities are very complete, if they added hair dryer it will be great.. 

Because this is a syariah-based hotel, you will not be "wrong" to enter the hotel if you are traveling with your family, especially children.
title: Excellent Hotel, great staff

text:
The hotel is wonderful with friendly staff that is helpful. It is a good hotel which is basically near the center of the town, (just walking distance to Jogja Expo Center and Central Library, oh.. and also the Famous Sate Pak Jogo ) and  it is convenient to get around. Clean nice hotel with lovely large room with balcony to a beautiful view of Merapi and the plane from Adisutjipto coming back and forth.
Will be nice if they add a sofa on their big room, or replace a small chair in the balcony with comfy sofa. 
My kids love the spacious pool, and the garden is also a big plus. 
The breakfast was good and vary, surprised they have a live cooking toast. But the taste of the rice buffet could be better. 
However, will be very happy to be back to Gran Dafam Rohan.
title: Pleasant Staycation at Grand Dafam Rohan Jogja

text:
The pool is large and very convenient for kids with 1.2 m depth, very suitable for kids at the age of 8-15 years old swimming.
The food variety was very good where they have a delicious local food combined with western menu, i stayed 2 days and there were variation in the food served.
The room is spacious and the quality is similar with other 4 star hotel at higher price.
Recommended for people with family who are looking an affordable hotel with good quality room and swimming pool.
title: Best price for high quality facilities

text:
I stayed there for no particular reason with my family.
I really want to give good review on this hotel since it' a new hotel with the iconic Tugu Jogja duplicate at the entrance (cool!), has nice room, spacious swimming pool, friendly attendances, various breakfast menu, and (since I am a moslem) they even put praying garbs and the Holy Koran in our room (that was a really great plus for me).
The small fridge, though, when I opened it, there was frozen, rotten bananas (pict uploaded), and the smell really ruined everything. Could have been better.
title: Could have been better
